mapper.select: select puc.product_upper_category_id, puc.product_upper_category_name, puc.product_upper_category_register_id, puc.create_date, u.user_id, u.name, (select count(*) from tb_product_upper_category) as totalCount from tb_product_upper_category puc left outer join tb_user u on (u.user_id = puc.product_upper_category_register_id) order by puc.product_upper_category_id

select plc.product_lower_category_id, plc.product_lower_category_name, plc.product_upper_category_id, puc.product_upper_category_id, u.user_id, u.name, count(*) over () as totalCount, plc.product_lower_category_register_id, plc.create_date from tb_product_lower_category plc left outer join tb_user u on (plc.product_lower_category_register_id = u.user_id) left outer join tb_product_upper_category puc on (plc.product_upper_category_id = puc.product_upper_category_id) where plc.product_upper_category_id = #{upperId}
select product_lower_category_id, product_lower_category_name from tb_product_lower_category where product_lower_category_id = #{lowerId}

select puc.product_upper_category_id, puc.product_upper_category_name, plc.product_lower_category_id, plc.product_upper_category_id as plc_product_upper_category_id, plc.product_lower_category_name from tb_product_upper_category puc left outer join tb_product_lower_category plc on(plc.product_upper_category_id = puc.product_upper_category_id)

select p.product_id, p.product_product_upper_category_id, p.product_lower_category_id, p.product_code, p.product_name, p.price, p.promotion_price, p.product_img, p.product_register_id, u.user_id, u.name, plc.product_lower_category_id as plc_product_lower_category_id, plc.product_lower_category_name as plc_product_lower_category_name, plc.product_upper_category_id as plc_product_upper_category_id, puc.product_upper_category_id as puc_product_upper_category_id, puc.product_upper_category_name as puc_product_upper_category_name from tb_product p left outer join tb_user u on p.product_register_id = u.user_id left outer join tb_product_lower_category plc on p.product_lower_category_id = plc.product_lower_category_id left outer join tb_product_upper_category puc on plc.product_upper_category_id = puc.product_upper_category_id where product_id = #{productId}
